mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document_editor(id, title, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES(#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, CASE WHEN LENGTH(COALESCE(content, '')) > 100 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(COALESCE(content, ''), 100), '...') ELSE COALESCE(content, '') END as content, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM document_editor ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT id, title, CASE WHEN LENGTH(COALESCE(content, '')) > 100 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(COALESCE(content, ''), 100), '...') ELSE COALESCE(content, '') END as content, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM document_editor WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{kw}, '%') ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM document_editor WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{kw}, '%')
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM document_editor WHERE id=#{id})
